name: com.walcht.ctvisualizer
description: High performance, out-of-core CT/MRI volume visualizer for very large datasets using the Unity game engine

samples.description: CT Visualizer sample for Windows/Linux target builds:

CT Visualizer XR sample for the Magic Leap 2 device target builds

Dependencies:
	- Magic Leap 2 SDK: https://github.com/magicleap/MagicLeapUnitySDK.git
